radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: MRI of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Smooth narrowing of a short segment of the distal left ureter at the ureterovesical junction.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Circumferential thickening and small irregular filling defects in the midportion of the left ureter, with ureteral dilatation, suggesting the presence of a tumor.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Slight enlargement of the circumferential mass noted three months before evaluation.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.date: At the time of current evaluation
radiographic_examinations.findings: Progressive thickening and enhancement of the left proximal ureter, with intraluminal filling defects extending to the ureteropelvic junction.
